# Objective of Getting and Cleaning Data Project #

Read , Analyze and Clean data which was about  "Human Activity Recognition Using Smartphones" data set and to make it look tidy.

## Basic Steps or Pre-requisites for this project ##

* Set the working directory
* Download the zip file from the data source and unzip it in the working directory.
* reshape2 package to be loaded for project purposes

## Starting with the project ##

* Run the run_analysis.R file step-by-step
* Output is stored as a variable named final_data and also the output has been wrote down to a file named tidy.txt

*For more details, please refer the codebook.md file*
